section.heading: Shared data and information with the Department of Employment Services.
section.text: The Department of Employment Services shall coordinate with OSSE to share data and information regarding the District's workforce and workforce development.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-11: § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11 provided that the creation of this section by § 6 of D.C. Law 22-11 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
Section 7038 of D.C. Act 22-130 repealed § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11. Therefore the changes made to this section by D.C. Law 22-11 have been given effect.
